command.name: sign
command.desc: Have stellard sign a transaction for you. You can introduce the transaction later with submit.

argument.name: tx_json
argument.desc:
This is the JSON representation of the transaction for server to sign with the private key of the secret.
If Sequence or Fee are not filled out then stellard will fill them in for if you.

argument.name: secret
argument.desc: The base58 encoded secret key of the signer.

argument.name: offline
argument.desc: If true stellard won't attempt to verify that the transaction is valid it will just sign it for you.

result.name: hash
result.desc: The hash of the submitted transaction.

result.name: tx_blob
result.desc: A hex representation of the signed transaction. This result can vary between calls even if supplied the same parameters.
